channel.title: Grunt shooting through walls [Fixed]
channel.description:
I reached where a grunt is hanging from a rope down a shaft. I took him out but when I stepped out into the shaft I was immediately fired upon. I could not find a shooter anywhere.
So I turned on God mode and noclip and found the culprit standing on the roof of the shaft, with no line of site, happily shooting me through the concrete ceiling.
Screenshots: [url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96554554[/url] [url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96554629[/url]
Sorry I don't have a getpos. I didn't know I needed it when I played through that section.

item.title: Grunt shooting through walls [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: tin
item.description:
Happened to me about 7 or 8 times now (kept reloading to try and work out where the heck they were)…
Has loaded correctly once - but of course at that stage I was expecting the invisible guy again, got smashed up real good, and reloaded thinking it would work if I followed a similar path again… It didn’t :S

I also had an invisible headcrab too - in the confined area after jumping over some crates where there are 2 tripod sentries to greet you. 3 headcrabs spawn in after you deal with the sentries, but I could only see 2 of them. And the 3rd was definitely present and moving around as expected… I kept getting hit by it.

Had the same issue. Only one guy stood in the shaft (left), others were invisible but shooting from the top.

Played the chapter again later and then the whole rope-sequence worked as intended, I think they were 3 rope-guys - one after another.

I think I was too slow in my first play through of that sequence, maybe I missed “the right time” for a specific “one more rope-guy”-trigger.
